product_name: Native Eyewear Linville Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The Native Eyewear Linville Polarized Sunglasses are a great choice for year-round use, whether mountain biking, running, hiking or hanging at the beach. Asphalt frames feature polarized gray lenses and are ideal for extremely bright sunlight; gray tint helps maintain color saturation and natural contrasts. Wood frames feature polarized brown lenses and are ideal for partial and full-sun days. N3(TM) polarized lenses block 40% of infrared light (decreasing eye fatigue), offer blue light filtering and 100% UV protection to minimize haze and enhance clarity. Lenses and lightweight, yet durable frames are built to withstand a high-velocity impact; frames endure extreme highs and lows in temperature. Temple ends hug behind your ears to keep sunglasses in place; Cam-Action Hinges(TM) quickly lock temples into position. Interchangeable lens system lets you switch out lenses to accommodate a variety of light conditions and activities (additional lenses not included). The Native Eyewear Linville Polarized Sunglasses fit large to extra-large profiles.
short_description: The Native Eyewear Linville Polarized Sunglasses are a great choice for year-round use, whether mountain biking, running, hiking or hanging at the beach.
